#OSC Sender
import OSC

c = OSC.OSCClient()
c.connect(('127.0.0.1', 12345)) 
oscmsg = OSC.OSCMessage()
oscmsg.setAddress("/startup")
oscmsg.append('HELLO')
c.send(oscmsg)

#OSC Receiver Threaded
import OSC
import time, threading

server = OSCServer( ("localhost", 12345) )
server.addDefaultHandlers()
server.timeout = 0


def debug_handler(addr, tags, stuff, source):
	print "---"
	print "received new osc msg from %s" % OSC.getUrlStr(source)
	print "with addr : %s" % addr
	print "typetags %s" % tags
	print "data %s" % stuff
	msg = OSC.OSCMessage()
	msg.setAddress(addr)
	msg.append(stuff)
	c.send(msg)
	print "return message %s" % msg
	print "---"

def eyetech_handler(add, tags, stuff, source):
	#do somthing

server.addMsgHandler("/debug", debug_handler)
server.addMsgHandler("/eyetech", eyetech_handler)

# List registered callback handlers
print "Registered Callback-functions are :"
for addr in server.getOSCAddressSpace():
	print addr

# Start OSCServer
print "\nStarting OSCServe\n. Use ctrl-C to quit."
st = threading.Thread( target = server.serve_forever )
st.start()

# Loop while threads are running.
try :
	while 1 :
		time.sleep(10)

except KeyboardInterrupt :
	print "\nClosing OSCServer."
	server.close()
	print "Waiting for Server-thread to finish"
	st.join()




	print "Done"
